definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: inquire, seek (NH id., Aram. [[בְּקַר]], bqar; also Eth. baqala: in deriv.; orig. divide discern, cf. Ar. baqara slit, rip, split)—only

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. sf. [[וּבִקַּרְתִּים]] consec. Ez Eze 34:11; Impf. [[יְבַקֵּר]] Le 13:36, Le 27:33, [[אֲבַקֵּר]] Ez Eze 34:12; Inf. cstr. [[לְבַקֵּר]] 2Ki 16:15 + 2 t.;—seek, look for, sq. [[לְ]] Le 13:36; seek (to distinguish) sq. [[בֵּין־טוֹב לָרַע]] Le 27:33; seek (in order to care for) sq. acc. [[חאׁן]] Ez Eze 34:11 (‖[[דרשׁ]]) v:Eze 34:12, fig. of ´[[י]] seeking his people; contemplate, sq. [[בְּ]] Ps 27:4 (‖[[חָזׇה בְּ]]);consider, reflect, abs. Pr 20:25 [[אַחַר נְדָרִים]] i.e. whether the vows were wise, or should be kept (cf. Str ad loc. & reff.); cf. perh. 2Ki 16:15 consider (what shall be done with the old altar); look at Klo, (so [[לְבַקֵּר]] 1Ki 3:21 for 2nd [[בַּבּׂקֶר]]), AV RV to inquire by, SyrVer for praying; perh. denoting some religious service to be performed by king himself, cf. esp. RS:Sem. i. 467.
